languages.text: "Просто на всякий случай — если тебе в голову придет мысль помочь Владайму, гони ее. Он не жилец".

traits.locale_text: "Ризза, Владайм не жилец. Еще не поздно встать на сторону Чорда".

languages.text: "Just in case you need to be told — if you ever entertain the thought of helping Vladaym, chase that thought away. He is not long for this world."
languages.original_text: "Просто на всякий случай — если тебе в голову придет мысль помочь Владайму, гони ее. Он не жилец".

traits.locale_text: "Let me tell you, just in case, if you ever entertain the thought of helping Vladaym, chase that thought away. He is not long for this world."
"Let me tell you, just in case, if you ever entertain the thought of helping Vladaym, chase that thought away. He is not long for this world."
"Let me tell you, just in case, if you ever entertain the thought of helping Vladaym, chase that thought away. He is not long for this world."
"Let me tell you, just in case, if you ever entertain the thought of helping Vladaym, chase that thought away. He is not long for this world."
"Just in case you need to be told — if you ever entertain the thought of helping Vladaym, chase that thought away. He is not long for this world."
"Just in case you need to be told — if you ever entertain the thought of helping Vladaym, chase that thought away. He is not long for this world."

languages.text: “以防万一，有件事情我要告诉你。如果你打算帮弗拉迪姆的话，还是打消这个念头吧，他活不了多久了。”
languages.original_text: "Just in case you need to be told — if you ever entertain the thought of helping Vladaym, chase that thought away. He is not long for this world."

traits.locale_text: “有件事情我要告诉你，以防万一。如果你打算帮弗拉迪姆的话，还是打消这个念头吧，他活不了多久了。”

languages.text: 「念の為言っておくが、もしヴラダイムを助けたいという考えを持っているのなら、その考えは捨てろ。奴はもうそう長くないだろう」
languages.original_text: "Just in case you need to be told — if you ever entertain the thought of helping Vladaym, chase that thought away. He is not long for this world."

traits.locale_text: 「念の為言っておくが、もしヴラダイムを助けたいという考えを持っているのなら、その考えは捨てろ。奴はもうそう長くないだろう」

languages.text: «Por si acaso, déjeme decirle que si alguna vez se le ocurre ayudar a Vladaym, se lo quite de la cabeza. No le queda mucho en este mundo».
languages.original_text: "Just in case you need to be told — if you ever entertain the thought of helping Vladaym, chase that thought away. He is not long for this world."

traits.locale_text: «Por si acaso, déjeme decirle que si alguna vez se le ocurre ayudar a Vladaym, se lo quite de la cabeza. No le queda mucho en este mundo».

languages.text: "Lasst Euch sicherheitshalber gesagt sein: Wenn Ihr jemals auf den Gedanken kommen solltet Vladaym zu helfen, verjagt den Gedanken. Er wird nicht mehr lang auf dieser Welt weilen."
languages.original_text: "Just in case you need to be told — if you ever entertain the thought of helping Vladaym, chase that thought away. He is not long for this world."

traits.locale_text: "Lasst Euch sicherheitshalber gesagt sein: Wenn Ihr jemals auf den Gedanken kommen solltet Vladaym zu helfen, verjagt den Gedanken. Er wird nicht mehr lang auf dieser Welt weilen."

languages.text: « Laissez-moi vous donner un conseil : au cas où vous envisageriez d'aider Vladaym, n'y pensez plus. Il ne sera bientôt plus de ce monde. »
languages.original_text: "Just in case you need to be told — if you ever entertain the thought of helping Vladaym, chase that thought away. He is not long for this world."

traits.locale_text: « Laissez-moi vous donner un conseil : au cas où vous envisageriez d'aider Vladaym, n'y pensez plus. Il ne sera bientôt plus de ce monde. »

languages.text: "Belki söylemem gerekir: Vladaym'a yardım etmek aklının ucundan bile geçmesin. Pek bir ömrü kalmadı çünkü."
languages.original_text: "Just in case you need to be told — if you ever entertain the thought of helping Vladaym, chase that thought away. He is not long for this world."
